context_bundle.summary: Communicating Sequential Processes (CSP) pattern where processes communicate through channels, inspired by Go goroutines and Clojure core.async

onboarding.quick_start: Model communication through channels (not direct messaging). Channels can be synchronous (blocking) or buffered (async). PhiVector adaptation uses filesystem as channel.
common_patterns: Channels: Communication happens through channels, not direct messaging
Synchronous channels: Blocking send/receive (sender waits for receiver)
Buffered channels: Async with bounded queue capacity
PhiVector adaptation: Filesystem directories act as channels
Select operation: Wait for first available message from multiple channels
known_errors: Blocking channels can cause deadlocks if not managed carefully
PhiVector cannot use true blocking (must poll)
Unbuffered channels require both sender and receiver ready simultaneously
